revised_title: Turbulent Transport and Combustion in Flames: A Review
tldr: This article reviews the current understanding of turbulent transport and mixing in flames, focusing on theoretical descriptions of turbulent reacting flows and the roles played by turbulent transport and mixing. It discusses interactions between combustion and turbulent flow, as well as flame-surface density formulations for premixed turbulent combustion. The article identifies topics that require further attention in the field.
